content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad we are discussing the rental price for the apartment. Let's negotiate for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal as a student from China is to secure the lowest price, not the highest. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
